stanza.line: The little Love-god lying once asleepasleep
Laid by his side his heart-inflaming brandbrand
Whilst many nymphs that vowed chaste life to keepkeep
Came tripping by but in her maiden handhand
The fairest votary took up that firefire
Which many legions of true hearts had warmedwarmed
And so the general of hot desiredesire
Was sleeping by a virgin hand disarmeddisarmed
This brand she quenched in a cool well byby
Which from Love fire took heat perpetualperpetual
Growing a bath and healthful remedyremedy
For men discased but I my mistress thrallthrall
Came there for cure and this by that I proveprove
Love fire heats water water cools not lovelove
